str2: On, to, against, on the basis of, at.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
Name, character, fame, reputation. From a presumed derivative of the base of ginosko; a 'name'.
From metanoeo; compunction; by implication, reversal (another's) decision).
A primary preposition; to or into, of place, time, or purpose; also in adverbial phrases.
A sending away, a letting go, a release, pardon, complete forgiveness. From aphiemi; freedom; pardon.
To proclaim, herald, preach. Of uncertain affinity; to herald, especially divine truth.
A primary preposition; to or into, of place, time, or purpose; also in adverbial phrases.
All, the whole, every kind of. Including all the forms of declension; apparently a primary word; all, any, every, the whole.
Probably from etho; a race, i.e. A tribe; specially, a foreign one.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Middle - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: To begin. Middle voice of archo; to commence.
From, away from. A primary particle; 'off, ' i.e. Away, in various senses.
Of Hebrew origin; Hierusalem, the capitol of Palestine.
